meththananda, jayalath pranandu, eena neyinakar, komador wolatar dilameyar, mejar iyustas fonsekapradarshanaya kala sinama shala - libarti( kollupitiya ) krawun ( maradana ) athulu sinama shala 21 ka di.thiragatha wu dinaya – 1976 mayi 28idiripath kirima – windana chithrapatanishpadanaya, adhyakshanaya, kathawa, thira natakaya – wasantha obesekarakamara adhyakshanaya - donal karunarathnasanskaranaya - lal disanayakawesha nirupanaya - derik pranandukala adhyakshanaya - sarathchandra samarakkodisakasuma – wijaya chithragarayashabda paripalanaya - jorj manathungarasayanagara palaka –es.

sancharaka aakarshanaya athin shri lankawatharu hathare hotalayak lesa nawikaranaya da hikkaduwa, chaya trans, nowambar masa 1da wiwrutha we.ema suwisal prathisanskarana ha abhyanthara alankaranaya gruha nirmana shilpi channa daswaththage athin sidu kerini.jon kils hotal samuhaye shri lanka nikethana ansha pradhani jayanthissa kehelmannala mahatha pawasanne, sancharaka karmanthaye aluth namiyawan nirmanaya karanna wime ape dakma anuwa, kisiwakuta anukaranaya kala nohaki eetama aawenika shailiyak saha salasumak athi ape sama nikethanayak ma samastha karmanthayatama purwadarshayak bawa ya.jon kils hotal samuhayatama ayath parani yala wilej da ese ma nawikaranaya wi, nowambar 1 da chaya walayild namin wiwrutha wana athara eya miliyana 500 ka aayojanayaki.
